items.title: krschroeder/base-elem-js: Very lightweight Dom manipulation and creation library

items.content_html: OpenSesame.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that enables developers to create keyboard shortcuts with timing functionality. The library's primary purpose is to detect specific key combinations and execute different actions based on whether the keys are briefly pressed or held for a defined duration.
items.title: fdz-marco/OpenSesameJS: OpenSesame.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that enables developers to create keyboard shortcuts with timing functionality. The library's primary purpose is to detect specific key combinations and execute different actions based on whether the keys are briefly pressed or held for a defined duration.

items.content_html: Mejiro is a lightweight web viewer with a strong focus on bookmark management.
items.title: andots/mejiro: Mejiro is a lightweight web viewer with a strong focus on bookmark management.

items.content_html: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.
items.title: krozamdev/masked-password: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.

items.content_html: TagIt.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides real-time, configurable tag suggestion functionality for both contentEditable elements and input/textarea fields. It supports custom triggers, async data loading with debouncing, middleware, and dynamic suggestion management.
items.title: deepansumor/TagItJS: TagIt.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides real-time, configurable tag suggestion functionality for both contentEditable elements and input/textarea fields. It supports custom triggers, async data loading with debouncing, middleware, and dynamic suggestion management.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that lets you quickly toggle JavaScript on or off for the current site. Use a simple keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/Command+J) or click the browser action icon to switch between enabling and disabling JavaScript, with a visual badge indicator showing the current state.
items.title: YounesElhjouji/toggle-js-extension: A lightweight Chrome extension that lets you quickly toggle JavaScript on or off for the current site. Use a simple keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/Command+J) or click the browser action icon to switch between enabling and disabling JavaScript, with a visual badge indicator showing the current state.
